attributes.action: Hold a General Election now before we formally give notice  to exit the EU.
attributes.additional_details: In May 2015 we elected MP's the majority of which have just voted REMAIN. We should not exercise our option to LEAVE until we have a Government that the British People support and everybody  understands before an election vote what the winners of that election intend actually to do in our future economic/political and social  relations with the rest of the world
attributes.background: The future relations with Europe and the rest of the World should be dependent on the most capable leaders the British Public in all four countries of the Union can elect and trust given the Brexit vote.
